---
title: alpha
last-updated: 2025-09-03
---

A small utility function that applies an alpha channel to a CSS color value.<br />
It uses the `hsl` color model to do so.

## The Gist

```tsx
import { alpha } from '@weser/theme'

const transparentRed = alpha('red', 0.5)
const transparentVariable = alpha('var(--background)', 0.5)
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type     | Description                                |
| --------- | -------- | ------------------------------------------ |
| value     | `string` | The CSS color value to apply the alpha to. |
| alpha     | `0-1`    | The alpha value as a float from 0 to 1.    |

## Returns

(`string`) A string that references a CSS color value with an alpha channel applied.

## Import Alias

For convenience, we also export a shorthand import alias.

```ts
import { a } from '@weser/theme'
```
